    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public User[] addUser(java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      int ageUser)
        Allows to create the new Object of the class User.
        pre:
        post: The User object has been created.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name. userName != "" and cannot have space
        password - the user password. password != "" and must be a string without space
        ageUser - the age of the user. ageUser != "" and greater than 0
        Returns:
        user.

      • hasUser

        public boolean hasUser()
        Allows to know how many user objects i have created.
        pre: The method called addUser must be initialized .
        post: the amount of my user objects.
        Returns:
        If numUser is less than MAX_USER is true, if not is false.

      • showUser

        public java.lang.String showUser()
        Allows to show the data of the each user created.
        pre: The methods called as addUser, addDataUser must be initialized and at least one user created.
        post: Showing the information of the user in the requerid format.
        Returns:
        dataUser.

      • addSongPool

        public Song[] addSongPool(java.lang.String tittleSong,
                          java.lang.String artistName,
                          java.lang.String realaseDateSong,
                          int minutes,
                          int seconds,
                          java.lang.String genderSong)
        Allows to create the new Object of the class Song.
        pre: There muste be at least one User to create songs.
        post: The song has been created.
        Parameters:
        tittleSong - tittle of the song. tittleSong != "" and must be a string.
        artistName - name of the artist. artistName != "" and must be a string.
        realaseDateSong - release date of the song. realaseDateSong != "" and in the format DD/MM/AA.
        minutes - minutes of the song. minutes = greater than zero.
        seconds - seconds of the song. seconds = greater than zero and less than sixty.
        genderSong - gender of the song. genderSong = must be one element from the Gender class.
        Returns:
        poolSong.

      • hasSong

        public boolean hasSong()
        Allows to know how many poolSong objects i have created.
        pre: The method called addSong must be initialized .
        post: the amount of my poolSong objects.
        Returns:
        If numSongs is less than MAX_SONG is true, if not is false.

        pre: The methods called as addSong, addDataUser must be initialized and at least one song created.
        post: Showing the information of the song in the requerid format.
        Returns:
        dataSong;

      • showNameUser

        public java.lang.String showNameUser()
        Allows to show the name of the each user.
        pre: The methods called as addSong, addDataUser must be initialized, at least one song created and one user.
        post: Showing the information of the user name.
        Returns:
        nameUsertoSong.

      • userIndex

        public int userIndex(int namePosicion)
        Allows to know which user adds a song to change its category.
        pre: The methods called as addSong, addDataUser must be initialized, at least one song created and one user.
        post: The user that created the song.
        Parameters:
        namePosicion - posicion of the user in the array. namePoscion = greater than 0 and less than ten.
        Returns:
        index

      • changeCategory

        public void changeCategory(int index)
        Allows to change the user category according to the number of songs created.
        pre: The user must have created a song.
        post: The category user has been changed.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the user. index = greater than 0 and less than ten.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • addPlayList

        public PlayList[] addPlayList(java.lang.String namePlayList,
                              User userName1)
        Allows to create a private PlayList.
        pre: Must exister at least one user and one song.
        post: The private PlayList has been created.
        Parameters:
        namePlayList - name of the private PlayList. namePlayList != ""
        userName1 - name of the user who has access to the playlist. userName1 != null
        Returns:
        thePlayLists.

      • addPlayList

        public PlayList[] addPlayList(java.lang.String namePlayList,
                              User[] usersRestrictedPlayLists)
        Allows to create a restricted PlayList.
        pre: Must exister at least five user and one song.
        post: The restricted PlayList has been created.
        Parameters:
        namePlayList - name of the restricted PlayList. namePlayList != ""
        usersRestrictedPlayLists - name of the users who have access to the playlis. usersRestrictedPlayLists != null and = 5
        Returns:
        thePlayLists.

      • hasPlayList

        public boolean hasPlayList()
        Allows to know how many PlayList objects i have created.
        pre: The method called addPlayList, addPlayListPublic, addPlayListPriavte or addPlayListRestricted must be initialized .
        post: the amount of my playlist objects.
        Returns:
        If numPlayList is less than MAX_PLAYLIST is true, if not is false.

      • whoIsTheUser

        public User whoIsTheUser(java.lang.String name)
        Allows to compare the position of the user who created the private PlayList with your index.
        pre: The methods called as addPlayList, addPlayListPriavte must be initialized, at least one private PlayList created and one user.
        post: The user that created the private playlist.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the user that created the private playlist. name != ""
        Returns:
        userPrivate.

      • usersRestricted

        public User[] usersRestricted(int[] indexs)
        Allows to know which users have access to the restricted playlist.
        pre: The methods called as addPlayList, addPlayListRestricted must be initialized, at least one private PlayList created and five user.
        post: which users can watch the playlist restricted.
        Parameters:
        indexs - posicion of the user that can watch the restricted playlist. indexs != "" and indexs greater than 0 and less than 5
        Returns:
        usersRestrictedPlayList.

      • addSongInThePlayList

        public void addSongInThePlayList(int index1,
                                 int index2)
        Allows add a song to the chosen playlist.
        pre: At leats one song and one playlist must exister.
        post: The song has been added to the PlayList.
        Parameters:
        index1 - posicion of the playlists. index1 = between one and the number of playlists created
        index2 - posicion of songs. index1 = between one and the number of songs
